### How to Use

Imagine you're wrapping up an intense workout session, and you need to bandage a minor sprain. Simply wrap your elastic bandage around the affected area and secure it with these trusty clips. Their metal hooks ensure that the bandage stays put no matter how much you move, giving you the freedom and flexibility to go about your day without worry.
